Class TerminalMenuController

java.lang.Object
clientGUI.Controllers.MenuControlls.BaseMenuController
terminalGUI.Controllers.TerminalControllers.TerminalMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatIF
public class TerminalMenuController extends BaseMenuController implements ChatIF
Controller for the main Customer Service Terminal menu. This class handles the primary navigation for walk-in customers and existing reservation holders, providing access to arrival confirmation, waiting list management, and reservation code recovery. * @author Software Engineering Student
Version:
1.0

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ChatClient client)
      Injects the shared ChatClient instance into the controller to maintain the network session.
      Parameters:
      client - The active network client instance.

    • display

      public void display(Object message)
      Receives and processes messages from the server. Specifically handles the recovery of active reservation codes and displays them in a thread-safe UI alert.
      Specified by:
      display in interface ChatIF
      Overrides:
      display in class BaseMenuController
      Parameters:
      message - The server response object (expected to be a List of strings).
